data.actual_result: `Jump to Present` banner/bar is on top of `Load More Messages` banner/bar.
data.expected_result: `Jump to Present` is below `Load more messages`
data.short_description: `Jump to present` bar overlaps 'Load more messages' bar.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a huge dm - Search up a very old part of the chat - Jump to that old part - Scroll down on chat until it says Load More Messages
